articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🚨 NEW @getP3RKS ALERT 🚨  
D_D Members get FREE TICKETS to the @3XPgg Web3 Gaming Expo!  
Enjoy 2 days of interactive booths, announcements, showcases, tournaments & quests!  
June 8th-9th at the Pasadena Conv. Center.  
Head to https://p3rks.xyz, sign in & claim! https://twitter.com/3XPgg/status/1659636027395284994

3XP Web3 Gaming Expo - Powered by Game7: 3XP has partnered with @developer_dao! 
Dev DAO is a community that empowers developers in the Web3 space to offer their developers free attendance to @3XPgg and support in their careers. https://t.co/SFeFmDboR6
